item.description:
Now that tax day is behind us and the weather is warming, join us for the first in a series of Scooter "Show and Tell" events.

Scooter owners: Time to haul out the scooter, gas it up and bring it for other members to see.

Scooter owner wannabes: Come with your questions and get answers! See real live scooters!

We will be having breakfast at the hotel and then going outside for "show and tell" For those members who wish to go for a ride, we will be departing at 12:30 for a slow scoot (<45mph) on back roads in Wellesley and Weston.

Hope to see you there!

Paul

Rain/Snow date 4/26
item.how_to_find_us: Look for helmets! join us inside at the Riverbend Restaurant for Brunch
item.why:
See different scooters and talk to the owners, so far you will see:
Burgman 650 Exec, Burgman 650, Burgman 400, Aprilia Scarabeo 250, Bandit 150, and a Lance 150
item.name: Scooter "Show and Tell" Brunch
